name: OVUNI 2600
description:
Please play it in full screen mode.

This is a crazy and nonsense space game.

I used the Atari 2600 color pallete and the Atari 2600 sound chip.

This game was made to be as similar as possible to the old Atari 2600 space games.

But with cool and crazy elements just for fun, cause it is my first game development.
